hero.title: AI-Powered Coding for Neovim
hero.subtitle: Experience Cursor IDE's intelligence in your favorite terminal editor. Transform your Neovim workflow with AI-driven code suggestions and seamless integration.

features.title: Why Choose avante.nvim?
features.subtitle: Bringing the power of AI-assisted coding to the world's most customizable editor

ai_completion.title: Intelligent Code Completion
ai_completion.description: Context-aware AI suggestions that understand your codebase and coding patterns

cursor_like.title: Cursor IDE Experience
cursor_like.description: Enjoy the same AI-powered features you love from Cursor, directly in Neovim

terminal_native.title: Terminal Native
terminal_native.description: Stay in your terminal workflow without switching to separate GUI applications

open_source.title: Fully Open Source
open_source.description: MIT licensed with full transparency and community-driven development

installation.title: Quick Installation
installation.subtitle: Get started with avante.nvim in minutes
installation.prerequisites_text: Make sure you have Neovim 0.10+ installed
installation.troubleshooting: Need help? Check our troubleshooting guide.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.subtitle: Connect with developers using AI-powered Neovim workflows

discord.title: Discord Community
discord.description: Get help, share configurations, and stay updated on the latest features

github.title: GitHub Repository
github.description: Contribute to the project, report issues, and explore the source code

sponsor.title: Support Development
sponsor.description: Help us maintain and improve avante.nvim with your sponsorship

user1.quote: avante.nvim has completely transformed my coding workflow. The AI suggestions are incredibly accurate and contextually relevant.
user1.author: Developer

user2.quote: Finally, I can enjoy Cursor-like AI assistance without leaving my beloved Neovim setup. This is a game changer!
user2.author: Neovim User

user3.quote: The seamless integration with my existing Neovim configuration makes this plugin indispensable for my daily development.
user3.author: Software Engineer

footer.description: avante.nvim brings AI-powered coding assistance to Neovim, combining the intelligence of modern AI tools with the flexibility of the world's most customizable editor.
